methods.name: CopyParameterOverrides
methods.doc:
Copy parameter values from another material instance. This will copy only
parameters explicitly overridden in that material instance!!

methods.name: InitializeScalarParameterAndGetIndex
methods.doc:
Use this function to set an initial value and fetch the index for use in SetScalarParameterByIndex.  This
function should only be called once for a particular name, and then use SetScalarParameterByIndex for subsequent
calls.  However, beware using this except in cases where optimization is critical, which is generally only if
you're using an unusually high number of parameters in a material and setting a large number of parameters in the
same frame.  Also, if the material is changed in any way that can change the parameter list, the index can be
invalidated.

methods.name: CopyMaterialInstanceParameters
methods.doc:
Copies over parameters given a material interface (copy each instance following the hierarchy)
Very slow implementation, avoid using at runtime. Hopefully we can replace it later with something like CopyInterpParameters()
The output is the object itself (this). Copying 'quick parameters only' will result in a much
faster copy process but will only copy dynamic scalar, vector and texture parameters on clients.
@param bQuickParametersOnly Copy scalar, vector and texture parameters only. Much faster but may not include required data

methods.name: GetScalarParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the current scalar (float) parameter value from an MID

methods.name: GetScalarParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Get the current scalar (float) parameter value from an MID, using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: GetTextureParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the current MID texture parameter value

methods.name: GetTextureParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Get the current MID texture parameter value, using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: GetVectorParameterValue
methods.doc: Get the current MID vector parameter value

methods.name: GetVectorParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Get the current MID vector parameter value, using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: InterpolateMaterialInstanceParameters
SetDoubleVectorParameterValue
methods.doc: Set an MID vector parameter value

methods.name: SetRuntimeVirtualTextureParameterValue
methods.doc: Set an MID texture parameter value

methods.name: SetRuntimeVirtualTextureParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Set an MID texture parameter value using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: SetScalarParameterByIndex
methods.doc:
Use the cached value of OutParameterIndex from InitializeScalarParameterAndGetIndex to set the scalar parameter
ONLY on the exact same MID.  Do NOT presume the index can be used from one instance on another.  Only use this
pair of functions when optimization is critical; otherwise use either SetScalarParameterValueByInfo or
SetScalarParameterValue.

methods.name: SetScalarParameterValue
methods.doc: Set a MID scalar (float) parameter value

methods.name: SetScalarParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Set a MID scalar (float) parameter value using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: SetSparseVolumeTextureParameterValue
methods.doc: Set an MID texture parameter value

methods.name: SetTextureParameterValue
methods.doc: Set an MID texture parameter value

methods.name: SetTextureParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Set an MID texture parameter value using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)

methods.name: SetVectorParameterValue
methods.doc: Set an MID vector parameter value

methods.name: SetVectorParameterValueByInfo
methods.doc: Set an MID vector parameter value, using MPI (to allow access to layer parameters)
